mapper.select: SELECT * FROM CART WHERE MEM_ID = #{mem_id} and CART_SHOW =1 ORDER BY CART_CODE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CART (MEM_ID, PRO_CODE, CART_DAY, CART_START, CART_CNT, PRO_NAME, PRO_PRICE, PRO_DESC, PRO_IMAGE) VALUES (#{mem_id}, #{pro_code}, #{cart_day}, #{cart_start}, #{cart_cnt}, #{pro_name}, #{pro_price}, #{pro_desc}, #{pro_image} )
mapper.update: UPDATE CART SET CART_DAY = #{cart_day}, CART_START = #{cart_start}, CART_CNT = #{cart_cnt} WHERE cart_code = #{cart_code}
UPDATE CART SET CART_CHECK = 0 WHERE MEM_ID = #{mem_id}
UPDATE CART SET CART_CHECK = 1 WHERE CART_CODE = #{cart_code}
UPDATE CART SET CART_SHOW = 0 WHERE CART_CODE = #{cart_code}
UPDATE CART SET CART_DAY = #{cart_day}, CART_START = #{cart_start}, CART_CNT = #{cart_cnt}, CART_SHOW = #{cart_show} WHERE cart_code = #{cart_code}
mapper.select: select * from (select * from cart order by cart_code desc limit #{skip},#{amount}) as T1;
